## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1570135eff60eea1dfd9ec7b66797d9454373263050b83c8ad90d2b7b37d71b6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'narratives-from-tweets' @ 0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
